fields.name: ClientProtocol
fields.description: Specifies whether redis clients can connect using TLS-encrypted or plaintext redis protocols. Default is TLS-encrypted.

fields.name: ClusteringPolicy
fields.description: Clustering policy - default is OSSCluster. Specified at create time.

fields.name: EvictionPolicy
fields.description: Redis eviction policy - default is VolatileLRU

fields.name: GeoReplication
fields.description: Optional set of properties to configure geo replication for this database.

fields.name: Modules
fields.description: Optional set of redis modules to enable in this database - modules can only be added at creation time.

fields.name: Port
fields.description: TCP port of the database endpoint. Specified at create time. Defaults to an available port.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Current provisioning status of the database

fields.name: ResourceState
fields.description: Current resource status of the database
